about_the_game:
Barro Racing- GT is a new mode with new cars and tracks. Just like the Formula mode, it will test your speed and ability in the track.

The game:
  • Casual race, just have fun.
  • Time trial, do your best and compete with players all around the world, lap-by-lap.
  • Up to 4 players local multiplayer, split screen, challenge your friends!
  • New cars
  • New race tracks
